alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 17 at 5:32PM CDT until March 17 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR HOUSTON COUNTY... At 532 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Columbia to Ashford to near Cottonwood, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Avon, Madrid, Gordon, Memphis, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Garretts Crossroads, Sigma, Enon, Wilson Mill, Southern Junction, Barber, Merritts Crossroads and Keytons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
